reviews.text: This review is for Super8 located at 649 South Lake Powell in Page.
reviews.title: Super8 at Page - good value!

reviews.text: We stayed here for 1 night before visiting Antelope Slot Canyon. It was a great value! We were given a huge room with 3 queen beds. The property seem fairly new and the rooms were clean. The continental breakfast was basic (toast, mini-muffin, juice & coffee, fruit and cereal), but they did have fruitloops which even the adults enjoyed. Overall we had a fine experience and would stay there again.
reviews.title: Nice, large, fairly new, clean room, breakfast needs help

reviews.text: This was a nice hotel. It was fairly new. The room and bathroom were clean, and the beds were comfortable.
reviews.title: Great place to stay while in Page

likes.liked: — Convenient location, clean rooms and facility, value.
likes.disliked: — Some newer development has negatively impacted the views, but still nice.

reviews.text: The elevator was slow, so if you are in hurry, try to get a room on the first floor. We requested a first floor room when we reserved our room, but ended up on the 3rd floor. The breakfast was a typical motel fare...bread , bread and more bread...actually 2 types of cereal, toast, muffins, bagles and apples plus two kinds of juice and coffee. The hot water was not working and the food and juice were not replenished quickly enough for visitors to get the full breakfast before having to leave.
reviews.title: OK

reviews.text: I really don't know which hotel the people stayed at that posted the negative reviews. I have stayed at this hotel almost every year since 2001. I tried another hotel in town for one night on one of those trips, but moved to the Super 8 after that one night. My stays have ranged from one night to 7 nights. Parking is good (we bring a boat to use at Lake Powell), the area is nice, property is nice, staff is friendly, it is convenient to shopping, they give you a coupon for free ice at the gas station, it has a very pleasant lobby and breakfast area.....I really don't know what is not to like about this well-run and good value hotel. They keep the property clean and well-maintained, and the grounds are also well groomed. I always make this hotel my first choice when planning a trip to Page.
reviews.title: Clean Motel, friendly and efficient reception
disliked very much
reviews.text: my credit card was billed 3 times for the same visit, i was billed for a day i wasnt even there, my kids found some drug paraphananail in the room, they moved us to another room and charged me again, and i have not been able to get ahold of the manager
This hotel has one computer in the lobby for all of the hotel guests to use. You have to stand in line to use the internet.
reviews.title: Do not stay here
Too Early For The Pool
reviews.text: Our credit card was double billed. We try to contact the manager and we are told that the manager will be in later. This has been going on for three days and my wife can not contact the billing manager.

reviews.title: Not Recommended
reviews.text: This hotel seems to have been formerly a Comfort Inn and as such we found the rooms to be more spacious than the average Super8. Housekeeping standards were fine and reception friendly and efficient. For the price this was a perfectly acceptable hotel for an overnight stay before heading on towards Nevada via Glen Canyon the following day.
